name: vg-api-challenge
description: Analyzes a match and reports on a player's performance

scripts.backup-archive: rm -f backup-archive/* && cp archive-*.json full-archive.json backup-archive/
scripts.restore-backup: rm -f archive-*.json full-archive.json && cp backup-archive/archivs-*.json backup-archive/full-archive.json .

author: Nathan Carter (ncarter@bentley.edu)
